resources.string:
Please read the about page carefully!
 V1.3
 [+] Downgrade minSdkVersion
 [+] Add new detection methods and interception methods
 [+] Add System Hook mode
 [+] UI redesign with more help information in about page
 [+] Due to the big changes to V1.1, if there are problems please uninstall and reinstall the module
 [@] nativeFile interception has not been completed, wait for next updates
 Known bugs
Under Edxposed YAHFA file detection hide does not work. (test version: 4683), please switch to Sandhook or LSPosed instead.
